subject: Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey’s knuckleballs come in at a different speed than the pitches of his opponents, but umpires can adjust and make the right calls, two veteran umps say.
snippet: R. A. Dickey’s knuckleballs come in at a different speed than the pitches of his opponents, but umpires can adjust and make the right calls, two veteran umps say.
